creator: mshuman@qanalydocs.com

comments.text:
Created attachment 8479166
FTU_Contacts_Screenshot.png

Description:
When progressing through the FTU, if the user connects and Data and/or a WiFi network, they are not able to import contacts from Facebook, Gmail, or Outlook.  The device is still connected to the network, because the user is able to create or sign in to a Firefox Account.

This issue does NOT occur when re-launching the FTU from the Developer menu.


Repro Steps:
1) Update a Flame to 20140826040204
2) In the FTU, connect to Data and/or WiFi
3) Progress to the Contacts import page


Actual:
Gmail, Outlook, and Facebook are not selectable, despite being connected to a network.


Expected:
Gmail, Outlook, and Facebook are selectable when connected to a network.

Environmental Variables:
Device: Flame Master
Build ID: 20140826040204
Gaia: 4d1d0ea5a82cddeeab497774cfa1703639e3c7d9
Gecko: dc352a7bf234
Version: 34.0a1 (Master)
Firmware Version: v123
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Mobile; rv:34.0) Gecko/34.0 Firefox/34.0


Repro frequency: 100%
Link to failed test case: https://moztrap.mozilla.org/manage/case/6119/
See attached: screenshot
comments.author: mshuman@qanalydocs.com
